title: Can't change default music for Google Pixel USB C headphones
content: I set up my USB C headphones for my Google Pixel 4, and I made the default music provider TuneIn radio... But I now want to change this. But I can't seem to find a way to do this! I've removed Google Assistant and readded it, but the option to change default music hasn't reappeared.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4
